img.alt: Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy | Formerly Milwaukee Collegiate Academy

article.class: post-5420 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail hentry

div.h1: FOR OUR SCHOLARS, LEARNING DOESN'T STOP.
div.h4: We will continue providing online learning opportunities and support for our scholars throughout the school year, just as we have over the past several weeks.

div.p: Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy will be sharing regular updates with our school community until school resumes. These updates may be short or may be long, depending on what new information is available that day. We also invite you to follow our story on social media.

ul.class: et_pb_module et_pb_social_media_follow et_pb_social_media_follow_0 clearfix et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_0 et_clickable et_pb_promo et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center

p.span: For important information and distance learning updates including weekly assignments, learning resources, and technology support, please click the link below.

h1.strong: NOW ENROLLING for the 2020-21 school year.

h1.span: 100% college acceptance rate seven years in a row!

br.span: Our class of 2019 earned over $2.5 million in scholarships.

div.class: et_pb_row et_pb_row_3 et_pb_row_fullwidth et_animated et_pb_equal_columns et_pb_gutters1

iframe.title: I wanted to let you know

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_3 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

div.p: This holiday season, your gift will help our kids live our mission of sending scholars to and through college.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_4 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left
et_pb_module et_pb_text et_pb_text_5 et_animated et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_left

p.span: Your generous gift will help support our college tours. This is a critical need. College tours for Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy students are a key piece of their high school experience. But, more than an experience, college tours are a key piece to living our school’s mission; It helps our students to visualize themselves attending to college. Please support us with a gift to help support our mission.

a.class: et_pb_button et_pb_custom_button_icon et_pb_button_2 et_animated et_hover_enabled et_pb_bg_layout_light

div.class: et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_2 et_pb_column_5 et_pb_section_parallax et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et_pb_column_empty

p.em: On September 27, over 20 seniors attended the UNCF’s Empower Me Tour. These scholars were inspired and came away with more than 100 college acceptances in a single day! Way to be great Class of 2020!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_number_counter et_pb_number_counter_0 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_with_title
div.h3: College acceptances seven years in a row!

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_number_counter et_pb_number_counter_1 et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_with_title
div.h3: Scholarship dollars earned by our Class of 2019

p.br:
School opens for breakfast at 7:35 a.m.
The first bell rings at 7:50 a.m.
Scholars are dismissed at 3:30 p.m.
On Wednesdays, students have an Early Release and are dismissed at 12:44 p.m.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay post-208442 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

img.alt: Medical College to Hold Town Hall on April 13

h2.a: Medical College to Hold Town Hall on April 13

div.p: Medical College of Wisconsin is hosting the third in its series of virtual community town halls Monday, April 13, at 6 pm, to talk about Coronavirus (COVID-19), staying safe and healthy, and to answer your questions.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_has_overlay post-208333 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-news

div.p: Parents, online learning began this week. We are thrilled that students are engaging in learning and with teachers directly using their online tools. If your child is not able to log into the Summit platform or the Google Classroom, please a ticket to the Technology...

div.a: Learn more about Personalized Learning at Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy

div.h3: For seven years in a row, 100% of Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy seniors have been accepted into college.

div.h4: Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy’s Class of 2019 earned $2.5 million in scholarships.

iframe.title: Our Mission: Say it with me

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_4 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_no_bg

div.h2: Every dollar you give to support Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy has an impact that extends far beyond our school walls.
div.p: As a City of Milwaukee public charter high school, state funding supports only 80% of our operating expenses when compared to a traditional Wisconsin public school. We rely on individual donations, recurring gifts, corporate matching gifts, in-kind donations, and grants to close this funding gap. Your 100% tax-deductible gift will help us enrich and sustain our public college preparatory high school program and fulfill our mission.

div.class: et_pb_module et_pb_cta_5 et_hover_enabled et_pb_promo et_pb_bg_layout_light et_pb_text_align_center et_pb_no_bg

iframe.title: Who drew on Mr. Green’s whiteboard?

p.strong: #WATCH: Who drew on Mr. Green’s whiteboard?

div.p: Are you struggling to decide what to watch on YouTube? Subscribe to Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy’s YouTube Channel. Just one of our posts – a self-produced music reaction video — has garnered nearly 2 million views. Our channel is a unique, fresh window into our high school’s students, staff, families and community. Check it out!
© since 2013 by Dr. Howard Fuller Collegiate Academy
